description:
Giroro returns, and he`s well on the path to conquering the city with a jungle of monstrous alien plants.  Natsumi, however, is determined to stop him.  She has never lost to Giroro once, and she doesn`t intend to start now!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La naissance d`un soldat / Le jour où volent les poissons
ギロロ 蘇ったソルジャー であります / 冬樹 およげこいのぼり! であります
